Container.Name: PlexRequests
Container.Description: Simple automated way for users to request new content for Plex [br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] This is where the PLex Requests configuration and library files will reside[br][br] Don't forget to enter in the host port and the config folder location. [br][br] [span style='color: #E80000;']3000[/span] is the WebUI port[br] To access the Plex Requests GUI, open the WebUI. See the following link for setup instructions: https://github.com/lokenx/plexrequests-meteor/blob/master/README.md [br][br] By default, the master/stable version is installed. If you would like to switch to the dev branch, set the EDGE variable to 1 in Advanced View.[br]
